titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony in an administrative hearing for Bryan K. Stanley before the Mississippi Division of Medicaid.
A resolution to authorize testimony in an administrative hearing for Bryan K. Stanley before the Mississippi Division of Medicaid.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution authorizes Senate employee Kim Coalter to testify in the administrative hearing of appellant Bryan K. Stanley before the Mississippi Division of Medicaid, except for on legally privileged matters.
